channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Just opened up and caused damage to car, 7th October
item.description:
On the left side of Road coming down Hill before Star College turn. Very dangerous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4070, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The whole road has holes, 7th October
item.description:
The whole road has tarmac missing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Hillary Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previous road repair failing, 7th October
item.description:
There is an old road repair outside my house which has now failed. When HGV's and vans drive over it my whole house shakes. There is also a banging and thud noise created when vehicles pass over it. Myself and my young family are often woken to the banging of vehicle going over this road repair. The photo does the do the situation justice, I tried to upload a video of a HGV passing. Please can you rectify the repair?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cirencester Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge crack in tree, 7th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rodney Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
